participant_1.background:
I remember playing with my cat in the backyard all day long.
i enjoy home cooked meals.
i live with my parents and my little brother.
I was born in the big city, but I now live in the country with my dog.
I love my family, even though they are a little bit crazy.

participant_2.background:
I have a crib in my office, so I can keep an eye on my child while I work.
if i were to be reincarnated , i d want to come back as a hippopotamus.
i love going to concerts on the weekend.
i am a psychology major.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do in your free time?
I love going to concerts on the weekend! What do you like to do?
I love going to concerts too! I also love spending time with my family and dog.
That's awesome! I also love spending time with my family and child.
Oh, cool! What are some of your favorite things to do with your family?
We love to go to the park, play games, and watch movies. We also love to go on vacations together.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going to the park with my family too. We also love to play games and watch movies.
It's great to hear that you have a close relationship with your family.
Yes, it is! I'm so lucky to have such a great family.
I'm glad to hear that! You seem like a really great person.
Thank you! You seem like a great person too!
Thanks! I'm glad we're having this conversation.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone new.
